statements: SELECT * FROM climate_satellite_data;
SELECT satellite_name, data_value FROM climate_satellite_data WHERE data_type = 'temperature';
SELECT satellite_name, data_value FROM climate_satellite_data ORDER BY data_value DESC;
SELECT satellite_name, AVG(data_value) AS average_value FROM climate_satellite_data GROUP BY satellite_name;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM climate_satellite_data WHERE launch_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM climate_satellite_data WHERE satellite_name = 'Satellite-A';
SELECT satellite_id, satellite_name, data_value FROM climate_satellite_data WHERE data_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY data_value DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, satellite_name, launch_date FROM climate_satellite_data WHERE data_type = 'humidity' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM climate_satellite_data;

SELECT AVG(data_value) AS avg_data_value, MAX(data_value) AS max_data_value, MIN(data_value) AS min_data_value FROM climate_satellite_data WHERE launch_date >= '2021-01-01' AND launch_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM satellite_data ORDER BY data_point DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, satellite_id, temperature FROM satellite_data WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY temperature ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT satellite_id, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM satellite_data GROUP BY satellite_id;
SELECT id, image_timestamp, image_url FROM satellite_images ORDER BY image_timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM satellite_data WHERE data_point BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY data_point ASC LIMIT 7;
SELECT * FROM satellite_data WHERE temperature > 50 ORDER BY data_point DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT satellite_id, AVG(temperature) AS average_temp FROM satellite_data GROUP BY satellite_id ORDER BY satellite_id
SELECT * FROM satellite_data WHERE temperature < 0.5 UNION SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE image_url LIKE '%.jpg%'
SELECT * FROM satellite_data INNER JOIN satellite_images ON satellite_data.satellite_id = satellite_images.id WHERE data_point = image_timestamp
SELECT satellite_id, COUNT(*) AS image_count FROM satellite_images GROUP BY satellite_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY image_count DESC
SELECT * FROM SatelliteData ORDER BY satellite_id DESC;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM SatelliteData WHERE data_type = 'weather' ORDER BY launch_date ASC;
SELECT satellite_name, data_type, data_size FROM SatelliteData WHERE data_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM ClimateData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT agency_name, location, contact_person FROM Agency WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM SatelliteData WHERE data_size > 1000;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM SatelliteData WHERE data_type = 'Image';
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date, data_type FROM SatelliteData ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClimateData WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 50;
SELECT Agency.agency_name, Agency.location, ClimateData.temperature FROM Agency INNER JOIN ClimateData ON Agency.agency_id = ClimateData.satellite_id;
SELECT * FROM satellite_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT satellite_id, temperature FROM satellite_data WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 0;
SELECT image_url FROM satellite_images WHERE satellite_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM satellite_users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action FROM satellite_logs ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_data WHERE temperature >= 30 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM satellite_data WHERE latitude BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY latitude
SELECT * FROM satellite_users WHERE role='admin' ORDER BY username
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM satellite_images WHERE satellite_id = 'e5f4dd7a-26d2-4d8b-970b-d0c41e17436c'
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action FROM satellite_logs ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT * FROM Satellite_Metadata;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM Satellite_Metadata WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT command_id, command_type, command_date FROM Satellite_Commands ORDER BY command_date DESC;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM Environmental_Data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT event_name, event_type, date_start, date_end FROM Climate_Events WHERE event_type = 'storm' ORDER BY date_start DESC;
SELECT * FROM Satellite_Metadata ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT satellite_name, status FROM Satellite_Metadata WHERE launch_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT satellite_name, image_date FROM Satellite_Metadata INNER JOIN Satellite_Images ON Satellite_Metadata.satellite_id = Satellite_Images.satellite_id;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM Environmental_Data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM Satellite_Commands WHERE command_date > '2022-03-01' ORDER BY command_date ASC;
